name: if
description: if(x,y,z) = returns y if x is non-zero, z if x is zero (for example, if (2>3,4,5) would return 5

x.name: Evaluation
x.description: If this field evaluates 0 the value of z is returned, otherwise the value of y is returned.

y.name: True
y.description: This value is returned if x evaluates to anything other then 0.

z.name: False
z.description: This value is returned if x evaluates 0.

name: or
description: or(...) = returns 1 if any of the specified numbers is other than zero, 0 if not

name: and
description: and(...) = returns 1 if all of the specified numbers are other than zero, 0 if not
